review: best product

The product received looks identical to the image. My 2 yr old likes to drink with a straw and this bottle has a pipe which she drinks from and once done, she just pushes the cap back on. I like the push open-close cap so that way, the pipe is not exposed to germs, bacteria, flies etc. Also, if you fill it with cold water, it stays cold unto 5 hrs. it holds 1/2 litre of water which is not bad. Because of the strap, easy for her to carry and for the parents 2
I had purchased it for my 3 year old daughter and after some days the inside straw started to tear near the cap closure part.. and now it is torn into two pieces.. Useless product. Waste of money.

Product is really good for that price. It's plastic insulated from inside and what I liked about is that it doesn't have smell of plastic unlike other water bottles. Some brands smells plastic n even water smells like plastic
Gud one...

Tried many bottles (all price ranges), but they all break within few months, and keeping some of them clean is also a headache. This is a very sturdy bottle at economic price, with simple parts - nothing like a push button which breaks within few days or is sometimes difficult for younger kids to open. It is easy to clean, no tension for it to be leaking and is colorful enough to keep a kid happy. A perfect Milton product! Seeing the quality, ordered it second time for my elder one also. The seller was also very cordial, and was kind enough to call and confirm the color we'd prefer.

The product is good and the seller was also very customer friendly. I got a call from the Seller before the product was dispatched and based on my request I got a bottle with pink and purple color mix. My daughter loved it. Thank you!!!
Product is good but not sure why is seller selling it for more than the MRP price printed of 150rs/-. I paid 215 so for this.
Very nice bottle, does not break even when my son throws it.....
